page.title: 10ST MARY'S PLAYGROUP
page.content: {EDUCATION CONTINUED} The accommadation is three or four beds to a room, each person has a hanging space and drawer space.The 5th year have there own study,the boys sleep downstairs and the girls sleep upstairs. PLAYGROUP There are 27 children in playgroup.They start at 3 and leave at 5 years of age.There is 2 groups every week.They do alot of things,here is a list of some of them water play,sand,glueing,lots of painting,construction,activities, dressing up,woodwork,beads,counters plastercine,bricks and playing with a railway-set.Each week the mummys pay 50p a morning .There isone supervisor, 1 assistant and two duty mums.The woodwork man comes on Thursdays.The children come at 9.15a.m.and finish at 11.30.
